title: Combine Recap, Barkley at No. 1?, Top QBs, Kirk Cousins Sweepstakes (Football 03/05)
description:
Will Brinson, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora return to recap the NFL Combine. The guys evaluate the top quarterbacks in this class, focusing extensively on Josh Allen's performance in Indy and where he could be selected. Will, Pete and JLC also react to reports that the Browns could be targeting Saquon Barkley with the number one overall pick, Shaqem Griffin's inspiring and stellar few days, and Orlando Brown's plummeting stock. The Pick Six crew then analyzes Kirk Cousins future as Jason believes it will come down to the Jets and Vikings.
